Easily calculate time difference: Sourc ...

Apr 23 2008 | WordPressBackup

Easily calculate time difference: Source: sys

How many days between two dates:

>>> import datetime >>> d1 = datetime.datetime(2005, 2, 16) >>> d2 = datetime.datetime(2004, 12, 31) >>> (d1 - d2).days 47

Runtime:

import datetime starttime = datetime.datetime.now() endtime = datetime.datetime.now() print (endtime - starttime).seconds

Get the time in 10 hours:

>>> d1 = datetime.datetime.now() >>> d3 = d1 + datetime.timedelta(hours=10) >>> d3.ctime()
